data.title: Could JJ Redick be the next Lakers head coach?
meta_keywords: SoCal What You Need to Know
data.meta_description: The "Lakeshow" hosts discuss the leading candidates.
data.text:
A week after Darvin Ham was let go, the Los Angeles Lakers are beginning their search for their next head coach.

Reporter Jovan Buha joins "Lakeshow" hosts Allie Clifton and Chris McGee to discuss the leading candidates and makes the case for former NBA player JJ Redick to be the team's next head coach.

Plus, why doesnât Anthony Davis get more respect nationally as one of the best defensive players in the NBA?

About the Show

Want to know everything happening day in and day out with the World Champion Los Angeles Lakers? Spectrum SportsNetâs Lakers hosts Allie Clifton and Chris McGee, along with Lakers Insider, Mike Bresnahan, have covered the team for a combined 30+ years and give you all the details on the Lakeshow podcast. Our hosts bring you an entertaining weekly discussion about all things purple and gold. Stay on top of the latest Lakers news, hear in-depth conversations about the latest team stories, and get your questions answered by our hosts every week, only on the Lakeshow podcast!

Join the conversation by submitting your comments and questions using the hashtag #LakeshowPodcast on Twitter, and by phone at 661-7-LA-LINE.
